Get Immersed in Pure Audio

  • Enhanced Audio Experience: Immerse yourself in the world of music with the Conch Theta C wired earphones. Experience powerful audio with its 14.2mm speaker drivers, delivering rich, crystal-clear audio.
  • Widely Compatible: Connect effortlessly to your favourite devices with the convenient Type C audio jack, making it easy to use these wired headphones with various smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other Type C compatible devices.
  • Unique Design: These type c earphones feature Unique design that provide better sound quality and are incredibly comfortable to wear. No more discomfort, enjoy hours of uninterrupted listening pleasure.
  • Convenient In-line Controls and Microphone: With in-line controls and a built-in microphone, these wired earphones with mic allow you to easily adjust volume, skip tracks, and take calls without reaching for your phone.
  • TPE Anti-tangle Wire: Say goodbye to frustrating knots and tangles with the 1.2m TPE anti-tangle wire. Simply plug in the c type earphones, wired to your device to enjoy hassle-free listening.
  • Note: If you encounter connectivity issues with your mobile phone, please open your device settings. Search for 'OTG' and enable the 'OTG Connection' option. If you experience persistent connection problems, contact our Customer Support for additional assistance.
  • 6-months Warranty
  • Importer/Manufacturer/Packer : Portronics Digital Private Limited, Ground Floor and First Floor, Property No. D 8 Upper Basement, Sector 8, Noida, Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, 201301
